content: JOHANNESBURG South Africa's competition watchdog recommended a fine equivalent to 10 percent of Unilever's local turnover for price fixing of edible oils and margarine  it said on Wednesday.
name: Unilever PLC
title: South Africa's antitrust watchdog seeks fine for Unilever

content: JOHANNESBURG  March 1 South Africa's competition watchdog recommended a fine equivalent to 10 percent of Unilever's local turnover for price fixing of edible oils and margarine  it said on Wednesday.    The Competition Commission said it had completed an investigation  which began in 2014 when it raided the local units of Unilever Plc and Sime Darby Bhd because it suspected price fixing.
name: Unilever PLC
title: UPDATE 1-South Africa's antitrust watchdog seeks fine for Unilever
